info.title: Renturo API Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for Renturo - Multi-tenant Property Rental Platform. This API serves three main applications: Client App (Property Owners), User App (Renters), and Admin Web Dashboard.

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token with OTP sent to mobile

message.example: Verification code was sent to your mobile number.

verification_code.description: 4-digit OTP (temporary in response, will be removed)

delete.description: Revoke the current user's access token

post.description: Request a new verification code to be sent to the user's mobile number. Rate limited to prevent abuse.

message.example: The verification code for your mobile has been sent to the number +639123456789.
Too many request for verification code. Please retry after waiting for 300 seconds.

put.description: Verify the user's mobile number using the verification code sent via SMS/Email

message.example: Your mobile phone number has been successfully verified.
The code is either not valid or has expired.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories along with their subcategories. This endpoint returns all active categories that are not soft-deleted.

message.example: The mobile number has not been verified yet. Please check your mobile for the verification code.

post.description: Create a new category. Only accessible by authenticated users.

get.description: Retrieve a single category with its subcategories by ID

put.description: Update an existing category by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a category by ID. This will not delete associated subcategories.

get.description: Search for categories by category name or subcategory name. The search is case-insensitive and requires a minimum of 3 characters. Returns a maximum of 10 results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search term (minimum 3 characters). Searches both category and subcategory names.

200.description: Search results (empty array if query is less than 3 characters or no matches found)

message.example: The mobile number has not been verified yet. Please check your mobile for the verification code.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all subcategories with their parent categories

post.description: Create a new subcategory under a specific category

get.description: Retrieve a single subcategory with its parent category by ID

put.description: Update an existing subcategory by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a subcategory by ID

get.description: Retrieve all subcategories for a specific category

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
bearerAuth.name: Authorization
